google_play_reviews.content: Fast and reliable

google_play_reviews.content: should be one of the best memo apps

Update: Came back to try it again and 4yrs later, still no Dark Theme. 11/18/2019: Really love everything about this note app. It actually beats out some of the ones I've paid for that I don't use anymore. Even tho it works flawlessly is there any chance of having a Black Theme soon? Writing in low light is not always comfortable with this theme. Thanks for making this and allowing us to use it for FREE!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tony, thanks for your feedback! Yes dark theme is on the map roadmap too: https://github.com/federicoiosue/Omni-Notes/issues/70

google_play_reviews.content: The Best App on Playstore This is the only App with option to select multi Images,Vedio's,Audio. It shares the complete event with Multimedia from other few good Apps. You can also add Multimedia with your Device inbuilt Camera No option for Folders for one category,better provided To use as a good Travel Diary,it should have Option to Add Expenses as well, showing Income, Expenses and balance On the whole "The Best" as free and open source Note : Not able to restore my previous Device Data
THANKY . _____

Was glad to use images and even make simple sketches in note entries.The hashtagging system and color customizable sorting system for user made categories is another huge plus, along with timestamps, its easy to keep track exactly when in a day i took note of something. only one thing that keeps me from rating this any higher is the lack of a search and replace system where i can look for and go to specific words. Would go perfectly with timestamps for extra lengthy,periodically updated notes.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, thanks for your feedback! The feature you're requesting is quite uncommon, it's typical for desktop text editor but not that much for note taking mobile apps.
Sadly extremely out of scope for ON!

google_play_reviews.content: Great app but lacks cloud backup feature . It will be unbeatable if you will add cloud backup .

A great app. Have been using it a while now. Have had no problems with adding images and audio. Would like to see a cloud backup option that would enable sync between devices please in the next update if possible. Keep up the good work. üëç
add a cloud sync target, encryption, and collaboration facilities

Well I'm enjoying it. Plesse don't crash on me üòä I've put a lot of effort in tonight. I have trouble walkng let alone typing things out. Please be kind lol. Thank you devs. This really is cool and easy to use even for my shaky oft uncontrolled limbs
Note App Doesn't Allow Drawing. Really? Why have a pen in the picture at all then? It is misleading and waste of time.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, you're allowed to draw actually. Just create a note and add a draw as attachment: it you're a very visual-oriented person you could also change settings to show your pictures before text also!

google_play_reviews.content: I find this app VERY useful!
Love the app and I've used it for a long time. One request though, could we get dark mode please?
Love your app. PLEASE add text size options.
Importanting an old backup is impossible. Looking for a replacement asap.

When I installed this on my Nexus 6 (7.1.1 Nougat) Upon launching the App, I got a circular spinner that would not stop spinning... Also, why is there no way to create voice Notes when I click on the Floating Action Button (lower right)? I though voice Note Taking was a feature of the App. Developers need to respond to customers issues, but instead just want everyone to provide high ratings
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Sorry for your issues but I have never bagged for high app ratings anywere.
I missed that part about vocal notes tho, you should enter into note editing and then select voice note, there is not such a shortcut from FAB right now!

google_play_reviews.content: Why not dark mode?
Works Perfectly. Fast Load-up. Local save only, is a big plus! Local save means you won't have your stuff on the cloud for hackers to steal. Auto save works great!
Good and very useful

I have left the beta, but after manually obtaining an old backup, placing it in Omninotes dir, i see that the new icon still says Beta. Google says No. Argh. Pin note! No effect. Is the app frozen in beta ?
Lean and nice
It needs (Auto sync to email)
Please bring back the TEXT SIZE option in Interface so that we have the option to make the notes/font size smaller!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback but actually using custom fonts styles and sizes in apps is a really bad practice because it breaks the user experience of your device. Your really should manage text size through your system settings, it'll be reflected into ON too!

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent app

Nice app I liked it, I think sketch should get a bit more love in the fact that it should be an option on the widget and the main menu instead of having to start a text note then insert an image.... Keep up the great work
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback!

google_play_reviews.content: Very good app! Best notepad I've ever used. A little addition could improve the overall user experience though; ability to directly backup to google drive, drive, Dropbox, other than springpad. **Plus fingerprint login** "that'd be very interesting" You should also consider "pinning messages" some messages could be "pinned to top"
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, thanks for the feedback!
Both your requests are on the roadmap, but for what concerns sync files will be available to be managed with any third party sync app to keep ON fully open source (Google Drive, Dropbox or other methods are not sadly)

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Sharing works exactly as in other applications: just share an image to Omni Notes and it'll create a new note with that attachment!

google_play_reviews.content: LOVE this app, great features & looks lovely! ONLY: A) Don't know how I'll manage without ANY formatting - no HIGHLIGHT or even BOLD! ü§î B) Love the TAGGING option, BUT when using it, NOTHING IS HIGHLIGHTED, so you have to strain your eyes (and ur patience) finding the TAGGED WORD in a maze of BLAND TEXT, looking for a needle in a haystack! ü§î It's the same with the SEARCH - NO HIGHLIGHTING of searched text! ü§î This app would be *SUPER* if this would be fixed, PLEASE!! üôèüèªüôèüèª Thank U! üíóüíóüíó
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback! Actually the app is designed to follow the principle "keep it simple (and stupid)" and this is the reason of missing formatting tools.
For what concerns highlighting on search a code contributor is taking care of its addition to the app!

google_play_reviews.content: The best note app, HANDS DOWN!
My favorite note-taking app for Android since 2016. Does everything I need it to do, and no crazy UI changes or updates to introduce things that I don't want.
Excellent app

It's a decent note app where you can store picture notes on it and stuff. But the reason why I score it low is because I can't seem to transfer over my notes to my new phone and it's super annoying. It doesn't have the option to backup to Google drive or something like that. Is there a way to choose where to back up the local backup? That way I can choose to back it up to a SD card then move it to my new phone? Right now, I have no idea where the file location of the back up is
google_play_reviews.replyContent: At the moment only local backup is available. This is because the app is mainly focused on privacy so you could just backup your data locally and then use a third party app for remote/cloud storage/restore

google_play_reviews.content: It's Great. Just add dark theme, ability to change font and size and search and it will be perfect
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Glad you like the app, the font size change feature has been removed because you should change the whole device fonts size instead that having a specific setting for any app.
Dark theme is on the roadmap!

google_play_reviews.content: Most complete note taking app. On top of that, it's open-source, ad-free and snappy. Just 1 REQUEST, please add auto backup with encryption
Excellent application for note taking and making check lists. Small request: Please add dark theme

Please add functionality to search specific occurances of words or phrases or tags and jump to the specific line. It can get very hard to search for a specific thought in a 300+ item long bulleted list of short paragraphs containing thoughts or logs in a bulleted (Checklist) type list. Additionally, please add an optionally toggle-able feature to do Fuzzy searches with for various terms like a search engine of sorts. This would be extremely useful as I have thousands of notes in my device.

Quite a drastic rating being a so much intensive user of the app don't you think?

Good app

Update - No worries, I get that! And I very much appreciate it and all that you do to keep it going and updated. That being said, I didn't want to give it another try if it was dead! I am currently trying out your Edge app and didn't realize it was you. And with the craziness going... Thank You - Have you thought about SubTask in the widgets & Edge app? - Is this app still alive? Meaning is the developer still involved with this app, still supporting this app as well as the Edge version of it??
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
https://github.com/federicoiosue/Omni-Notes/commits/develop Of course it is. Keep in mind that this is a fully free app managed during my free time, so releases can't be that much frequent as in paid or enterprise apps.

Feel free to contact me by email or on GitHub for more informations!

google_play_reviews.content: Checklist mode notes get VERY LAGGY if you have say 100 entries, & it takes forever to scroll all the way to the bottom to write down a new idea. If we can have PUBG play flawlessly on a phone why can't we have a notes app that lets you type instantly? Also, pls add a search btn WITHIN NOTES already FFS
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your feedback. I took it very seriously and here what came out: https://github.com/federicoiosue/Omni-Notes/issues/840

google_play_reviews.content: Google drive missed

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, full notes encryption is not currently supported but you are already able to "lock" notes. This will encrypt that specific note by using a password.

this is certainly one of the best note taking apps around, but there are just 2 problems i found with it: 1- theres a backup option (settings > data > backup) but no option to export files, to save a specific note or all notes to a folder and then transfer it to your PC or whatever, 2- theres a word limit (which is nonetheless pretty high), this is bad for me because i write very long notes and i might run out of spsce and have to continue in another note

I've tried more note taking apps then I can remember. But, Omni Notes is the one I have been looking for. Open source, minimal trackers (per Exodus Privacy), material design, and straight forward/works as expected. Please keep up the good work. Thanks Federico!

google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, you already can edit categories by long-touching them on navigation panel.
The new version will store notes ALSO on JSON text format to allow easier synchronization by using third party apps: don't think that'll be ready to read for a human anyway due to the need of keeping all metadata (attachments, category, reminders...) inside it

google_play_reviews.content: The backup/restore function does not work. Just lost all my data because of this. For those of you looking for a secure and reliable way of handling your data - be aware of this and maybe consider another app.

Good note app. Similar to Google keep. There's a bug I found though.

access. That bug squished and an undo and redo functionality would be super 
cool! Keep up the good work dev!

The Best of all Reminders
Why is omni notes requesting my LOCATION when I exit it, although everything under Privacy is disabled? (Detected by XPrivacy)
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Requests are ONLY made if auto-location is active OR the user specifically asks for it by adding position to a note.

Maybe XPrivacy detects permissions DECLARED but not runtime requests?

You're welcome to give a look to the source code anyway.

google_play_reviews.content: Fast, looks epic, works fantastic.

I've to say that I find your Omni notes app very useful and so thank you for your great effort.  But I've faced two problems with it:   1- All my Arabic words are underlined by a red line it seems that the app doesn't support Arabic!!?   2- sometimes I record voices by reading loud my note, the problem is when I press the attachment icon, It drops off hiding some words from my note during recording and if I slide the screen down the then the drop off disappears and the recording process is cancelled automatically.  So I suggest that recording option has a separate icon to avoid this problem
Switched from Gnotes since a more privacy friendly app is preferable. Missing a few features but quite usable.

You have to appreciate an app that provides you with a service you want and none of the chaff that seems to follow modern app design. I can't trust everyone with my data all the time, so I'll use whoever doesn't ask for it.

So far this app looks great!. Does all the basics with ease. Intuitive interface. I too would love to be able to point this to a folder in Dropbox, which is how I share my 800+ notes, at work, at home and on phone so they are all sync'd. Thanks.

If you are trying to seamlessly move notes from one device to another you can forget about it. I have lost a lot of work despite making numerous backups as this stupid app seems unable to recognise anything I've saved when moving notes to a new phone. Use something else for note taking - you'll be more productive and save a lot of time and energy.

hope to have these features/amendment :  1) reminder tone for certain reminder 2) auto backup 3) repeat reminder in trash but cant find next repeat in current folder! 4) voice read out reminder 5) date format for backup
Just one bug, app is force closed when I move item in to do list.

Bought new phone but couldn't install old notepad. Tried 4 different note pads before finding this one. It is even better than my old one. Being in aviation, this app is a must for me. Thanks for this app and a great job by the developer.
Worthy app, does this app allow you to create (1) folders, (2) sublists and (3) subtasks?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: (1) yes, they're called "categories". Other requested things are not on the application roadmap.

google_play_reviews.content: This feature would turn it into a choice app for taking notes.
i would like to see an option in settings to remove the reminder feature;  i don't use it, and i am always hitting it by accident.  that's my only complaint really.  thanks Federico! üëç
Please add dark theme and feature to modifiy the creation date of note. Keep improve!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Note's creation date is unmodifiable by design. Why would you like to change it anyway?

google_play_reviews.content: Overall it's a versatile app which I'm starting to love, but please give the web version so I can access it anywhere internet can get through and make me able to lock a whole section (category) instead of getting my hands clammy just to lock my private notes one by one. Last thing, please make a widget to show a single note it would be deadly useful to everyone.

Just started using this and so far so good. If you can get Cloud Syncing and lock specific notes and them being completely hidden you will overtake GNotes as lots of people are unhappy with GNotes now it's not free. Thankyou
I miss online backup & dark theme. Great work devs!

This app seems pretty awesome! I've been looking for Google Keep alternative b/c GK has no local bkp + limited file type attachments - which this app does both of!! But big problem in that no pop-up notifications, only status bar ones + sound. Desperately need pop-ups as all other reminder apps have. Dev kindly looking into this but hoping for answer sooner so using this venue here as don't know where else to go. Anyone know if there is fix?

I really like to use this apps for tracking my daily activities and my task works but.. first, can you add online backup function? Great app to use for storing text documents and all, but needs a backup Feature just in case phone starts to act up and have to reset the whole thing over. Because of that, I lost a lot of good notes and couldn't recover them. Please install a backup feature.
It's great. Omni Notes supports right to left typing while evernote doesn't. Thanks

Many reviews mention the lack of a synchronization component but I find it refreshing to have a note app where I don't worry about how securely my notes are being transferred because they never leave my phone :)

Installed the app and used it all the time. It was an awesome app, but the first time I updated it, it wiped out all my notes and left me with nothing. I've lost all my important notes and information that I save in my phone just by updating the app
Want zoom in bad light

After using this app for a few years, I've downgraded it from 5 to 3 stars because it doesn't have any cloud syncing between the two devices and there is no cloud backup. But it's a very good app to keep my daily notes, you can tag notes and do the basic things, delete, etc, but you can merge several small notes together to make one large note, one of the best features. Sorting, sharing, etc are very easy to do. Cheers, Rocky (. Y .)

It would be my prime note app, keeping it but barely using due to lack of cloud sync.  I'd like at least to be told if this much asked for feature is planned anytime soon, otherwise I'll just move on. Thanks.
Tried the big names.. this is the one I go back too. . Keep up the good work. Clean simple always works best. Open source and high quality.  Great app

I like this much better than Keep. My only complaint is that I can't seem to find a way to sync this to my desktop computer (a Mac). The way Keep works now with my desktop is cludgy, but it does work. Any chance of a desktop client? ‚ò∫

Otherwise, most powerful user friendly note taker, amazing job! **would like to see a calender/planner extension or separate app with similar capabilities in future
